remarks: Sufficient condition for an operation maps-to notation to be set-like. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2019.)
statement:
fmpt2.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
fnmpt2i.2 $e |- C e. _V $.
mpt2fvexi.3 $e |- R e. _V $.
mpt2fvexi.4 $e |- S e. _V $.
mpt2fvexi $p |- ( R F S ) e. _V $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d x y $.
